Package es.optocom.jovp.engine

Class PsychoEngine

java.lang.Object
es.optocom.jovp.engine.PsychoEngine
public class PsychoEngine extends Object
The JOVP engine that manages the Observer, Screens, Window, Input, and Renderer
Since:
0.0.1

    • PsychoEngine

      public PsychoEngine(PsychoLogic psychoLogic, int distance, ViewMode viewMode, Input input, Paradigm paradigm, boolean validationLayers, boolean apiDump)
      Main method for the JOVP
      Parameters:
      psychoLogic - Logic for the psychophysics experience
      viewMode - Viewing viewMode
      distance - Viewing distance of the observer in mm
      input - Input to use as input for observer's input
      paradigm - The psychophysical paradigm to use
      validationLayers - Whether to use validation layers
      apiDump - Whether to use the VK_LAYER_LUNARG_api_dump layer
      Since:
      0.0.1
